The Price is only $7.99 USD, lowest compared to any online / offline certifications material.

Exam Information

CompTIA Server+ certified candidates can work in any environment because it is the only vendor-neutral certification covering the major server platforms. It is the only industry certification that covers the latest server technologies including virtualization, security and network-attached storage.
CompTIA Server+ certification validates the skills necessary to be a server administrator. Successful candidates will have mastered the following concepts:

Virtualization
Storage
Security
Troubleshooting
Number of Questions	Maximum of 100 questions
Exam Description	Server+ covers server architecture, administration, storage, security, networking, troubleshooting as well as disaster recovery.
Length of Test	90 Minutes
Passing Score	750 (on a scale of 100-900)
Recommended Experience	A+ Certification
Individuals with 18 to 24 months of IT experience
 

Why take this brain dump?

The questions in the practice tests always stay current. We ensure this by taking the Official CompITA certification ourselves, and prepare/update questions for practice accordingly.
These questions will help you score at least 80% on the main exam.

Who this exam and testing engine is for:

Jobs that use CompTIA Server+
 

Server Support Technician
Server Administrator
IT/Server Technician
Storage Administrator
